data.title: B.N. College
data.text: B.N. College is located at Dhubri Town, the head quarter of Dhubri District, Assam which shares international border with Bangladesh and inter-state border with Meghalaya and West Bengal. It is situated in between 26003สน N latitude and 89097สน E longitude and is about 34m above the sea level. The college is well connected by all means of transportation and can be reached by air from Gopinath Bordoloi International Airport, Guwahati and Bagdogra Airport, Siliguri, West Bengal. New Bongaigaon (Assam) and New Coochbehar (West Bengal) are the nearby railway stations. Bus service is available from all the stations.
